# AppContext

**Associated Type**

Container type used for storing and retrieving app specific information that can be accessed whenever (and wherever) this intent gets run

## Declaration

```swift
associatedtype AppContext : Decodable, Encodable, Sendable = Never
```

## Discussion

Default Value: `Never`
title: AppContext
